citations.narrative:
The facility sold two puppies before the animals were at least 8 weeks or 56 days old. Disposition records showed that
two Pomeranian puppies (#3363 and #3378) were sold and ownership transferred on 7/8/2025 with their date of birth
being 5/15/25. Puppies transported or sold in commerce before 8 weeks of age may cause additional stress and an
increased risk of health problems. No dog shall be delivered by any person to any carrier or intermediate handler for
transportation, in commerce, or shall be transported in commerce by any person unless such dog is at least eight (8)
weeks of age and has been weaned. Correct by ensuring puppies sold or transported in commerce are at least 8 weeks
of age (56 days) and have been weaned. Correct by 7-OCTOBER-2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a Facility Representative.
n

narrative:
2.130 
   
Minimum age requirements. 
The facility sold two puppies before the animals were at least 8 weeks or 56 days old. Disposition records showed that 
two Pomeranian puppies (#3363 and #3378) were sold and ownership transferred on 7/8/2025 with their date of birth 
being 5/15/25. Puppies transported or sold in commerce before 8 weeks of age may cause additional stress and an 
increased risk of health problems. No dog shall be delivered by any person to any carrier or intermediate handler for 
transportation, in commerce, or shall be transported in commerce by any person unless such dog is at least eight (8) 
weeks of age and has been weaned. Correct by ensuring puppies sold or transported in commerce are at least 8 weeks 
of age (56 days) and have been weaned. Correct by 7-OCTOBER-2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a Facility Representative. 
 
 n
